TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DragDeltaEventArgs extends System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs

Docs.summary: Provides information about the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta"> event that occurs one or more times when a user drags a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control with the mouse.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(float64 horizontalChange, float64 verticalChange) cil managed

Docs.param: The horizontal change in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> position since the last <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> event.
The vertical change in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> position since the last <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> event.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragDeltaEventArgs"> class.

Gets the horizontal distance that the mouse has moved since the previous <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta"> event when the user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control with the mouse.
Docs.value: A horizontal change in position of the mouse during a drag operation. There is no default value.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void InvokeEventHandler (Delegate genericHandler, object genericTarget);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void InvokeEventHandler(class System.Delegate genericHandler, object genericTarget) cil managed

Docs.summary: Converts a method that handles the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta"> event to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragDeltaEventHandler> type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This implementation casts the as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragDeltaEventHandler>.

Docs.summary: Gets the vertical distance that the mouse has moved since the previous <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta"> event when the user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> with the mouse.
Docs.value: A vertical change in position of the mouse during a drag operation. There is no default value.
